channel.title: I ported, hosted a server. now it's all not working?
channel.description: Hey, so i was hosting a fucking server. ok so, i ported everything worked fine, i use pfportchecker everyone was working now, pf portchecker cannot detect shit. now, i cant host my server. i can't figure out why..

item.title: I ported, hosted a server. now it's all not working?
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

[quote=“nemisesv2, post:5, topic:439227”][quote author=Thanks link=topic=541927.msg3970539#msg3970539 date=1334100268]

For the port checker to detect the port, you need to have the server running, the ports only can be seen if its being used.

So run the server and check the port again.

I don’t believe thats true as I have used it without running my server…but it could be a possibility.

OT: Do you have a static ip? Your ip for your router or whatever you use could of changed and made your server offline(the default gateway) so check it out.

Utorrent and other torrents also can sometimes block your server from being online so check if they are running.
[/quote]Well, I’m running it on VPS, that’s how it is on there, never was stupid enough to run it on my home network lol.[/quote]

Haha gotcha

Read full topic
